plays.text: Penalty to Ruslan Salei 2 minutes for Holding Steve Yzerman

Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Holding Samuel Pahlsson
Penalty to Sandis Ozolinsh 2 minutes for Holding Henrik Zetterberg
Goal scored by Paul Kariya assisted by Niclas Havelid and Steve Rucchin
